Patients receive docetaxel weekly 10 cycle ( cycle consist treatment 3 week every 4 ) DES daily 40 week evidence disease progression , whichever occur first . Patients follow determine PSA objective response . Additional endpoint include time progression , disease specific survival overall survival .
